settings.title: Welcome to Scotty Browns Bike Emporium
settings.text:
We are a Christchurch bike shop icon with a heritage since 1992. Our shop is a funky and cool nook with plenty of bike history, collectors bikes and all around cycling candy for all two wheel enthusiast. A visit to see our store is well worth it, our team will definitely make you feel welcome.

We passionately believe that cycling is more than a sport and very much a lifestyle. The team at Scotty Browns is in every way focused and dedicated on our customers, we thrive on making your experience at the store exciting and fun. It’s engrained in our ethos. We absolutely respect that our customers want and need premium service, selection and advice. 

We stock brands that we know and trust with a wide range of road bikes, mountain bikes, electric bikes and gravel bikes, whether you are a serious racer or just enjoy riding your bike. Looking for something with a battery, or maybe your first bike that will not break the bank? We have got you covered. The store is also well decked out with cycling apparel, including our own Scotty Brown designs, accessories and bike components. 

Our bike workshop is epic, the guys have incredible knowledge and old school skills each with over 22 years experience. For all your bike servicing needs in Christchurch pop in and see the guys. We offer a range of different service options to meet your needs.

Come in and have a look around our store, our team look forward to meeting you!
